Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.name: error
Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.abstract: A String that identifies the type of error that occured

Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.name: code
Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.abstract: An Int that identifies the code of error that occured

Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.name: description
Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:vV19RPHTTPSe.abstract: A String that identifies the description of error that occured

Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:FV19RPHTTPSe.name: isValidError()
Structs/ErrorResult.html#/s:FV19RPHTTPSe.abstract: Checks if the error is correctly formed. (i.e: with a code and error)

Structs/ErrorResult.html.name: ErrorResult
Structs/ErrorResult.html.abstract: This structure is used to wrap errors into ObjectMapper’s Mappable objects

Enums/RPServiceClientError.html#/s:FO19R.name: RequestError
Enums/RPServiceClientError.html#/s:FO19R.abstract: Request error, occurring when the API is returning a statusCode of 4xx

Enums/RPServiceClientError.html#/s:FO19R.name: RequestFailure
Enums/RPServiceClientError.html#/s:FO19R.abstract: Request failure, occurring when the API is returning an error

Enums/RPServiceClientError.html.name: RPServiceClientError
Enums/RPServiceClientError.html.abstract: this enum represents the errors that can occur using the NetworkClient

Classes/RPServiceClient.html.name: RPServiceClient
Classes/RPServiceClient.html.abstract: You should subclass or extend this class in order to make your API calls backed with Moya/Alamofire and returning ObjectMapper models
